original: @82a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @82a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: aashta ma h'a sth'a na tsee tya sto tra /
analyzed: aashta ma h'a sth'a na tsee tya sto tra /
translated: Aṣṭamahāsthānacaityastotra

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: gnas chen po brgyad kyi mchod rten la bstod pa /
analyzed: gnas chen po brgyad kyi mchod rten la bstod pa /
translated: Praise of the Stūpas of the Eight Great Sacred Sites

original: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to youthful Mañjuśrī!

original: dang po byang chub mchog tu thugs bskyed nas //
analyzed: dang po byang chub mchog tu thugs bskyed nas //
translated: First, you generated the supreme mind of awakening

original: bskal pa grangs med gsum du tshogs bsags te //
analyzed: bskal pa grangs med gsum du tshogs bsags te //
translated: And gathered the accumulations for three incalculable eons.

original: byang chub snying por sangs rgyas bdud ni btul //
analyzed: byang chub snying por sangs rgyas bdud ni btul //
translated: At the heart of awakening, you became a buddha and tamed Māra.

original: byang chub chen po'i mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: byang chub chen po'i mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the stūpa of great awakening!

original: chos kyi gzhir gyur ser skya'i grong khyer du //
analyzed: chos kyi gzhir gyur ser skya'i grong khyer du //
translated: In the city of Kapila, the basis of the Dharma,

original: sgyu ma'i yum las zas gtsang sh'akya rigs 'khrungs //🔽sku bzhengs sta zur g-yas la tshangs pa bzhes //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i yum las zas gtsang sh'akya rigs 'khrungs // sku bzhengs sta zur g-yas la tshangs pa bzhes //
translated: You were born from Queen Māyā to Śuddhodana of the Śākya clan.🔽When you rose, Brahmā appeared to your right.

original: bkra shis 'byung ba'i mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bkra shis 'byung ba'i mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the stūpa of auspicious origins!

original: b'a r'a na s'i la sogs bsod snyoms gshegs //
analyzed: b'a r'a na s'i la sogs bsod snyoms gshegs //
translated: You went for alms in Vārāṇasī and other places,

original: gzugs can snying po'i glang chen smyon pa rnams /
analyzed: gzugs can snying po'i glang chen smyon pa rnams /
translated: And the crazed elephants of Bimbisāra

original: phyag gi sor mo'i stobs kyis btul nas kyang //
analyzed: phyag gi sor mo'i stobs kyis btul nas kyang //
translated: And with the strength of his fingers, he subdued them.

original: grong khyer 'dul mdzad mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: grong khyer 'dul mdzad mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the Stupa of the Taming of the City.

original: ne gsing dag tu bsnyel so mdzad pa'i tshe //
analyzed: ne gsing dag tu bsnyel so mdzad pa'i tshe //
translated: When he rested in the fields,

original: ha lu manydzu sa sbrang rtsi phul nas kyang //
analyzed: ha lu manydzu sa sbrang rtsi phul nas kyang //
translated: Halumandju offered him honey,

original: khron par dus byas sum cu rtsa gsum skyes //
analyzed: khron par dus byas sum cu rtsa gsum skyes //
translated: And after his death in a well, was reborn in the Heaven of the Thirty-three.

original: thugs rje 'byung ba'i mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: thugs rje 'byung ba'i mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the Stupa of the Origin of Compassion.

original: tshangs pas 'khor lo phul nas 'khor lo bskor //
analyzed: tshangs pas 'khor lo phul nas 'khor lo bskor //
translated: Brahma offered him a wheel, and he turned the wheel of Dharma.

original: mu stegs ston pa drug ni stobs kyis btul //
analyzed: mu stegs ston pa drug ni stobs kyis btul //
translated: He subdued the six non-Buddhist teachers through his power.

original: sprul pa'i grangs kyis lha mi tshim mdzad pa'i //
analyzed: sprul pa'i grangs kyis lha mi tshim mdzad pa'i //
translated: He satisfied gods and humans with emanations.

original: cho 'phrul bstan pa'i mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: cho 'phrul bstan pa'i mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the Stupa of the Display of Miracles.

original: dga' bo la sogs klu yi tshogs rnams kyis //
analyzed: dga' bo la sogs klu yi tshogs rnams kyis //
translated: Nanda and other naga hosts

original: bsnyen bkur 'bul ba'i bu mos 'o ma drangs //
analyzed: bsnyen bkur 'bul ba'i bu mos 'o ma drangs //
translated: Offered service, and his daughter offered him milk.

original: bka' dang @82b 'jig rten ma lus tshar gcod pa //
analyzed: bka' dang @82b 'jig rten ma lus tshar gcod pa //
translated: He conquered all the teachings of the world.

original: nyer zhi rgyal ba'i mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: nyer zhi rgyal ba'i mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the Stupa of the Victorious One's Peace.

original: byang chub sems dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // nyan thos dgra bcom tshogs kyis yongs bskor te //
analyzed: byang chub sems dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // nyan thos dgra bcom tshogs kyis yongs bskor te //
translated: And the hosts of Arhats, the Disciples,

original: sdom dang tshul khrims la ni rab bkod pa'i //
analyzed: sdom dang tshul khrims la ni rab bkod pa'i //
translated: And by those who are established in the precepts and the rules of conduct,

original: rnam par dag pa'i mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa'i mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the pure Stupas.🔽With the intention of taming impermanent beings,

original: sems can mi rtag 'dul ba'i dgongs pa dang // lha las babs nas mdzad pa kun gyi mthar //
analyzed: sems can mi rtag 'dul ba'i dgongs pa dang // lha las babs nas mdzad pa kun gyi mthar //
translated: And at the end of all his deeds, descending from the gods,

original: tsun das gsol btab zla gsum nas mthar phyin //
analyzed: tsun das gsol btab zla gsum nas mthar phyin //
translated: At the request of Cunda, he completed the three months.

original: mya ngan 'das mdzad mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das mdzad mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the Stupa of the Buddha's Nirvana.

original: gnas chen po brgyad kyi mchod rten la bstod pa /
analyzed: gnas chen po brgyad kyi mchod rten la bstod pa /
translated: Praise of the Stupas of the Eight Great Places

original: slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: By the great master Nagarjuna.
